title: NPP China and Belgium branches boost Patriotic Institute with financial and training support
desc: The Patriotic Institute on Thursday, 19 February 2026, received donations from two external branches of the New Patriotic Party (NPP), in a move described as a significant boost to its political education and capacity-building efforts.

title: NASA Investigates How People Respond to Air Taxi Noise
desc: New kinds of aircraft taking to the skies could mean unfamiliar sounds overhead — and where you’re hearing them might matter, according to new NASA research.

title: The huge challenge King Charles faces after Andrew's arrest revealed
desc: The latest scandal involving Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor will be a tough one for King Charles to tackle, an expert has claimed.

title: Barcelona learn staggering asking price for Julian Alvarez from Atletico Madrid
desc: Barcelona’s search for Robert Lewandowski’s successor has hit a massive roadblock after Atletico Madrid slapped a record-breaking valuation on Julian Alvarez.

title: Olu urges prayer, spiritual reawakening
desc: The Nation Newspaper Sanwo-Olu urges prayer, spiritual reawakening

title: Eric Dane, Grey's Anatomy and Euphoria actor, dead at 53
desc: Dane died from amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, known also as Lou Gehrig’s disease, less than a year after he announced his diagnosis.

title: Roll Initiative On My Wallet: 5 Board Games I’m Blaming On Community Game Day
desc: Ahead of NAG’s first Community Board Game Day, here are five wishlist games I’m ready to add to my shelves, strategy, chaos and all.

title: Yungblud Completes ‘Idols’ With Part
desc: "Idols (Complete)" includes a fresh batch of seven tracks, including a new version of “Zombie” featuring The Smashing Pumpkins.

title: Complainant felt offended over not sharing stage with Amitabh Bachchan, says Rajpal Yadav’s lawyer
desc: Rajpal Yadav has been granted interim bail by the Delhi High Court and released from Tihar Jail in a case filed against him by businessman Madhav Gopa.

title: Construction bosses say tougher laws needed to stop return of Building Bad
desc: Former IBAC chief Alistair Maclean says he is “shocked” by the lack of resolve from government, the public service and integrity agencies to tackle corruption.
